alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:19PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tensas, northern Concordia and central Catahoula Parishes through 1045 PM CDT... At 1019 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newellton to near Clayton to near Larto. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ferriday, Clayton, Lee Bayou and West Ferriday around 1025 PM CDT. Newellton and Lake Bruin around 1030 PM CDT. Spokane around 1040 PM CDT. Monterey and Waterproof around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sicily Island and Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern and west central Mississippi.
